H0.text: Who was appointed as England's first astronomer royal. Edmond Halley

H1.text: Who was appointed as England's first astronomer royal. Robert Hooke

H2.text: Who was appointed as England's first astronomer royal. Isaac Newton

H3.text: Who was appointed as England's first astronomer royal. Flamsteed

A4.text: He was the second Astronomer Royal in Britain, succeeding John Flamsteed in 1720.

A5.text: Halley succeeded John Flamsteed in 1720 as Astronomer Royal.
